description: Based on a true story, a 13-year-old boy who uses a wheelchair is determined to win a trophy like his athletic older brother.
keywords: based on real person,teenage protagonist,death of daughter,interracial friendship,intergenerational friendship
name: Miracle in Lane 2

review.name: Frankie for the win!
review.reviewBody: I am teetering between a 5 and 6 rating because this Disney channel original movie was far and away better than most of the ones that came before it, but some of the god scenes (especially at the end with the angels in wheel chairs) was kind of dumb and to me soap box racing is just kind of boring. But little Frankie Muniz is adorable and carried this movie. All the other actors are pretty decent as well. It's cool to this was based on a true story. This movie covered some heavy topics without getting too heavy. The brother dynamic was sweet though the actors were kind of obviously older than the characters ages they were portraying. Not the best movie, but it was a sweet story. I'd recommend a watch.
